sentences.en: Car makers are constantly refining their designs.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商在不断完善他们的设计。

sentences.en: Finally he found out how to refine iron and other metals with fire.
sentences.cn: 最终他发现了如何用火炼铁及其它金属.

sentences.en: Modern medical techniques refine on those of the pass.
sentences.cn: 现代医学技术比过去的医学技术优越.

sentences.en: Modern medical techniques refine on those of the past.
sentences.cn: 现代医疗技术比过去的医疗技术要优越.

sentences.en: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
sentences.cn: 油经过提炼去除天然生成的杂质。

sentences.en: PDVSA uses it to refine 200,000 barrels per day - well below its capacity.
sentences.cn: PDVSA每天 使用它提炼200,000桶油,这远远低于它的产能.

sentences.en: Reading good books helps to refine our speech.
sentences.cn: 读一些好书有助于使我们的言谈更优雅.

sentences.en: Refine the Use Cases - include requirements, constraints, complexity rating, notes and scenarios.
sentences.cn: 完善用例 - 包括需求, 约束 、 复杂程度 、 注释及情形.

sentences.en: Surgical techniques are constantly being refined.
sentences.cn: 外科手术技术正在不断得到完善。

sentences.en: The author is planning to refine on his work of five years ago.
sentences.cn: 作者打算把他5年前的著作修改得更完美些.

sentences.en: The eighteenth century sought to refine upon Shakespeare by altering and adapting his plays.
sentences.cn: 18世纪,人们试图通过改编莎士比亚的作品来超过他.

sentences.en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油.

sentences.en: The shape and form there. You have only to refine the work.
sentences.cn: 模型和样板已经形成, 你要做的只是精雕细琢.

sentences.en: They refine sugar using this way.
sentences.cn: 他们用这种方法精制糖.

sentences.en: We shall have to refine on our methods of advertising.
sentences.cn: 我们得进一步改进做广告的方法.

sentences.en: With the power of advanced technique, we evolve and refine principle.
sentences.cn: 我们用先进技术的力量改进和发展原则.

sentences.en: Works of taste can refine the mind.
sentences.cn: 高雅的作品能陶冶心灵.

sentences.en: You must not refine too much upon this charade.
sentences.cn: 你切不可过分推敲这个字谜.

words.tran_cn: [油气][化工][冶] 精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的
精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯

trans.tran_en: to improve a method, plan, system etc by gradually making slight changes to it
to improve a method, plan, system etc by gradually making slight changes to it
to make a substance purer using an industrial process
